content: Couldn't find existing threads on this. Is there a possibility/plan to add CodeableReference as Observation.value and Observation.component.value ?
We are facing a genomics use case in which obs.component.value to either points to a resource or needs to reference a concept via a CC
derivedFrom would also be a good candidate for codeabelReference, if you want to derive from "knowledge" often times you link to a knowledge space via an identifier
For anything that's already polymorphic and supports both CodeableConcept and Reference as choices, why would you need the new type?
oh! i was getting too excited about codeableReference and didn't realise that CC and Reference are already available. :face_palm:
Patrick Werner has marked this topic as resolved.
